api.name: sample
api.desc: This is an example API item, it's name is 'sample'. the URL this can be accessed at is at '/sample' if privateloc is not defined, it will not work. if the privateloc is not defined, it will try to use a file in the specified api folder with the same name. the description is optional.

api.name: redirect
api.desc: Simple example redirection script that logs all redirects

api.name: resetKeys
api.desc: Script to reset valid API keys
